about me
my name is Anhelina
i`m a web-developer with marketing background. being attentive to details, i do my job in accuracy to the technical task. besides of web-developing, i develop myself in different fields as software engineering, ui/ux design and digital marketing. therefore i`ll ask a lot of question about the project to dive into the depth of idea
